description:
18.30 showwavespic
Convert input audio to a single video frame, representing the samples waves.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: showwavespic

options.description: Specify the video size for the output. For the syntax of this option, check the (ffmpeg-utils)"Video size" section in the ffmpeg-utils manual. Default value is 600x240.
options.name: size

options.description: Set if channels should be drawn separately or overlap. Default value is 0.
options.name: split_channels

options.description: Set colors separated by ’|’ which are going to be used for drawing of each channel.
options.name: colors

options.description:
Set amplitude scale.

Available values are:

‘lin’

Linear.

‘log’

Logarithmic.

‘sqrt’

Square root.

‘cbrt’

Cubic root.

Default is linear.
options.name: scale

options.description:
Set the draw mode.

Available values are:

‘scale’

Scale pixel values for each drawn sample.

‘full’

Draw every sample directly.

Default value is scale.
options.name: draw

options.description:
Set the filter mode.

Available values are:

‘average’

Use average samples values for each drawn sample.

‘peak’

Use peak samples values for each drawn sample.

Default value is average.
options.name: filter
